summary: Russell Brand sets out to find out how other countries are tackling their problems of drug abuse and to explore how the framework of criminalization implicit in the 'war on drugs' produces enormous harm in the treatment of addicts.
cast: Russell Brand|Nick Clegg|David Cameron|João Goulão|Benjamin Mancroft|Neil McKeganey|Noreen Oliver|Steve Rolles|Jon Snow|Mike Trace
title: Russell Brand: End the Drugs War
